tei:p.tei:hi: Handwritten letter from Rosenthal to Schenker, December 14, 1894

tei:translation.tei:p: The fact that it is not permitted for articles that have appeared in Die Zukunft| to be reprinted has prompted me to place my material elsewhere, since I set very great store by their dissemination—not for my own sake but in the interests of the good cause. The article will probably appear simultaneously in several cities.
But I have still further darts to fire off, and the first of these ought (in the good sense) to belong to Die Zukunft.
In ever asking for your forgiveness, {2} I remain ever
With kindest regards, Yours truly, [signed:] Moriz Rosenthal
